// frontend/src/components/AddUser.js import React, { useState } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import Layout from './layout'; // Import Layout component import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; // Import useNavigate from react-router-dom const AddUser = () => { // State for the form fields const [user, setUser] = useState({ firstName: '', lastName: '', dateOfBirth: '', phoneNumber: '', address1: '', address2: '', city: '', postalCode: '', country: '', email: '', userNotes: '' }); const navigate = useNavigate(); // useNavigate hook to navigate programmatically // Handle input change const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setUser((prevUser) => ({ ...prevUser, [name]: value })); }; // Handle form submission const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Prevent page refresh try { // Post data to the backend API endpoint const response = await axios.post('/api/addUser', user); console.log('User added successfully:', response.data); // Check success // Reset form fields after submission setUser({ firstName: '', lastName: '', dateOfBirth: '', phoneNumber: '', address1: '', address2: '', city: '', postalCode: '', country: '', email: '', userNotes: '' }); // Navigate to the view users page navigate('/viewUser'); } catch (error) { console.error('Error adding user:', error); } }; return (

); }; export default AddUser;
